summary: This document is a search and seizure warrant issued for Little Saint James Island in the U.S. Virgin Islands. It authorizes law enforcement to search the premises and seize property believed to be relevant to an investigation, with a deadline for execution set for August 24, 2019.

persons.name: Ruth Miller
persons.context: Ruth Miller is the judge who signed the search warrant for Little Saint James Island.

events.title: Search and Seizure Warrant Execution
events.description: Law enforcement is commanded to execute a search warrant on Little Saint James Island.

locations: Little Saint James Island, U.S. Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The search warrant was issued for Little Saint James Island and any buildings or structures on it.
The warrant allows for the search and seizure of property believed to be relevant to an investigation.
The execution of the warrant must occur on or before August 24, 2019.
Immediate notification of the search may be delayed due to potential adverse results.
Ruth Miller is the United States Magistrate Judge who authorized the warrant.
